definitions.text: a contagious skin infection caused by the itch mite; characterized by persistent itching and skin irritation
examples: he has a bad case of the itch

definitions.text: an irritating cutaneous sensation that produces a desire to scratch
scrape or rub as if to relieve itching

examples: I'm itching--the air is so dry!

definitions.text: have a strong desire or urge to do something
examples: She is itching to start the project
He is spoiling for a fight
